text: Isny im Allgäu is a town in Ravensburg in Baden-Württemberg, Germany. It is in the Allgäu region. Isny was a Free Imperial City (Freie Reichsstadt) until the mediatisation of 1803. == References == == Other websites == * Category:Towns in Baden-Württemberg Category:Imperial free cities Category:Ravensburg (district)
title: Isny im Allgäu
